span.strong: In Stock, can be shipped out in 5-14 days

p.span: The Logan Modern Sectional with Recliner is made of top-grain Italian leather with a modern style. It includes three reclining chairs and a corner. The feet are made of solid wood so the sectional is durable and stable. Each seat has an adjustable headrest, and the backrest is very user-friendly. A well-designed console table can be used for storage and a charging station. This sofa is ideal for large gatherings and movie nights. Perfect for a contemporary home and lovers of comfortable lounging.

span.strong: Default sectional includes 1*LAF Chair with Power Recliner + 1*Console + 1*Armless Chair with Power Recliner + 1*Corner + 1*Armless Chair + 1*RAF Chair with Power Recliner
